client.controllers

Class mainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controllers.AppController
      • client.controllers.mainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class mainController
extends AppController
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Main controller class controls the template: 'main' The main screen of the application. all the others pages will be open in this 'center' pane menu actions, log out, Notifications
    Version:
    1.0 - 01/2020
    Author:
    Group-10: Idan Abergel, Eden Schwartz, Ira Goor, Hen Hess, Yuda Hatam
